channel.title: portrait on Robert Pickering
channel.description: Recent content in portrait on Robert Pickering

item.title: Lorna - Marché St. Ouen
item.author: contact@robertfpickering.me (Robert Pickering)
item.description: I met Lorna though an advert for casting for a short film. She’s an Italien actress, model, jaza singer, cinephile and tortured artist. We took some shots at the flea market in St. Ouen, just to the north of Paris.

item.title: Down in the Woods
item.author: contact@robertfpickering.me (Robert Pickering)
item.description: The following is fiction. Louise is an actress I have photographed before. We set of to the woods to take some photos that would provoke and tell a story. The rest is left to your interpretation.
